subject: Re: Items for website

full_threads.body:
Hi Jack, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/eyelid-surgery-blepharoplasty

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/eyelid-surgery-blepharoplasty
done creating the landing page.

it would be nice if they can hide some of the elements on the vimeo video (settings can be found on the vimeo dashboard)

(Time: 30mins) @ricaR

Hi @glen need your help with this. We already have the draft page for the eye surgery landing page - https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=23465&action=elementor

Things to do:
  • Two Videos of eyelid surgery (below link from Vimeo):
    Upper Eyelid Surgery and Brow Surgery: https://vimeo.com/1069443416
    Lower Eyelid Surgery: https://vimeo.com/1069443774
  • We want it set up like the facelift landing page: https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/facelift/. with no navigation etc
  • The copy is in the pdf file attached.

Hi Jack,

The contact forms have been fixed.

We’ll now begin uploading the content for the Eye Surgery landing page.

Let us know if there’s anything else you’d like us to include.

Hi @ricaR ,

All done on the form popup.

(Time: 30mins)

Hi Rica

For the landing pages we require the following:

Two Videos of eyelid surgery (below link from Vimeo)

Upper Eyelid Surgery and Brow Surgery: https://vimeo.com/1069443416

Lower Eyelid Surgery: https://vimeo.com/1069443774

We want it set up like the facelift landing page: https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/facelift/. with no navigation etc

Once this is done we will set up similar landing pages for Pony Tail lift and Rhinoplasty

(attached is sample content from existing site : https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/procedure/blepharoplasty/. )

thanks

Jack



Dr Jack Zoumaras

full_threads.body:
Hi Jack,

I've finished creating the draft page for the Eyelid Surgery landing page. We’ll just need the content to upload, such as the copy, images, or videos, whenever it's ready.

We’ll also begin updating the dates on all existing blog posts. I’ll keep an eye out for the Eyelid Surgery content.

Let me know if there’s anything else you need!

full_threads.body: Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks!
Done creating the Draft for Eyelid Surgery, waiting for client to provide content.

Hi Jack,

Thank you for your patience!

We’re currently working on your requests and would appreciate it if you could provide the content or copy for the eye surgery landing page. Once we have it, we’ll be able to move forward smoothly.

Looking forward to your response!

Hi Rica

Yes happy for you guys to proceed with Tasks 2/3 whatever it takes

Jack
